title: Trisha Krishnan
content: Trisha Krishnan is an acclaimed Indian actress and model, predominantly known for her work in Tamil and Telugu cinema. She began her career in 1999 with the Tamil film 'Jodi' and has since established herself as a leading actress in South Indian films. Trisha has received several awards for her performances and is also recognized for her philanthropic efforts, including her role as a Goodwill Ambassador for PETA.

acf_fields.school: Sacred Heart Matriculation Higher Secondary School, Church Park, Chennai
acf_fields.father: Krishnan (Deceased, former General Manager at a five-star hotel in Hyderabad)
acf_fields.family_: Only child; resides with her mother and maternal grandmother, Sarada Ganapathy
acf_fields.famous_moviestv_shows_for: Varsham, Ghilli, Saamy, Nuvvostanante Nenoddantana, Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa, 96, Ponniyin Selvan I & II, Leo
acf_fields.famous_moviestv_shows: Varsham, Ghilli, Saamy, Nuvvostanante Nenoddantana, Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa, 96, Ponniyin Selvan I & II, Leo
acf_fields.upcoming_projects: Thug Life (with Kamal Haasan), Vidaa Muyarchi (with Ajith Kumar), Vishwambara (with Chiranjeevi), Identity (with Tovino Thomas)
acf_fields.awards_&_achievements: Miss Salem (1999), Miss Chennai (1999), Kalaimamani Award (2010), Filmfare Awards South for Best Actress in various years
acf_fields.relationship_status: Unmarried; previously engaged to Varun Manian; rumored relationships with Rana Daggubati
acf_fields.brand_endorsements: Fanta, Scooty Pep+, Vivel Di Wills, Fairever fairness cream
acf_fields.fact1: Trisha aspired to become a criminal psychologist before entering the film industry.
acf_fields.fact2: She won the 'Beautiful Smile' title in the Miss India 2001 pageant.
acf_fields.fact3: Trisha is a Goodwill Ambassador for PETA and an avid animal lover.
